Instruction: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In a separate bowl, combine the eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract, and whisk until well blended.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.

Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Take it out and sprinkle the nuts and sugar on top of the cake, then put it back in the oven until it springs back when touched, about an additional 20 to 30 minutes. Carefully cut a small hole in the cake and insert a quarter into the hole, trying to cover it with sugar. Allow the cake to cool on a rack for 10 minutes before inverting it onto a plate.
Serve the cake while it is warm.
